text: The Ace of Cads is a 1926 American romantic drama movie directed by first time director Luther Reed and was based on the short story of the same name by Michael Arlen. It stars Alice Joyce, Adolphe Menjou, Norman Trevor and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. It is a lost movie. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1926 romantic drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Luther Reed
title: The Ace of Cads
